data.title: GRAPUS: GRAvitational instability PopUlation Synthesis
data.name: grapus
data.description: Population synthesis of self-gravitating disc fragmentation and tidal downsizing in protostellar discs

evidence: "This repository executes population synthesis modelling of self-gravitating disc fragmentation and tidal downsizing in protostellar discs."
"The code is written in FORTRAN 90 throughout. The supplied Makefile compiles the program using gfortran through the command `> make` And run using the command `> ./grapus`"

"If you plan to use this code for your own research, or if you would like to contribute to this repository then please get in touch with a brief description of what you would like to do.  I will seek co-authorship for any subsequent publications."
